title: Switch to Private Search Engines
tip: Try DuckDuckGo, Startpage, or Brave Search for privacy-focused searching.

title: Use Open-Source Maps
tip: OsmAnd and Organic Maps are great alternatives to Google Maps.

title: Self-Host Your Email
tip: Consider ProtonMail or Tutanota for privacy-respecting email services.

title: Replace Chrome Browser
tip: Browsers like Firefox, Brave, and Vivaldi offer more privacy controls.

title: Block Trackers
tip: Use uBlock Origin or Privacy Badger to block trackers and ads.

title: Review App Permissions
tip: Regularly check and limit app permissions on your devices.
